name: Quick Smith (Masterclass Final Build)
description:
Quick Smith is an exciting game that immerses you in the role of a blacksmith's apprentice. Your objective is to craft weapons for customers quickly and survive for as many days as possible. As more customers arrive, the game becomes more challenging, and failing to meet their expectations results in defeat. 

Quick Smith offers a unique twist on the co-op management genre, departing from the more common cooking-related games and instead adopting a blacksmithing approach.

Group Members:
Jason Green
Jack Howlett
Jonathan Gibson
Chloe Western
Tom Gemmell
